name: feDropShadow
desc: This filter creates a drop shadow of the input image. It is a shorthand filter, and is defined in terms of combinations of other filter primitives.

props.name: stdDeviation
props.desc:
The standard deviation for the blur operation in the drop shadow.

This attribute is forwarded to the stdDeviation attribute of the internal feGaussianBlur element.

The lacuna value is 2.

props.name: dx
props.desc:
The x offset of the drop shadow. This attribute is forwarded to the dx attribute of the internal feOffset element.

The lacuna value is 2.

props.name: dy
props.desc:
The y offset of the drop shadow. This attribute is forwarded to the dy attribute of the internal feOffset element.

The lacuna value is 2.

props.name: flood-color
props.desc: The color of the drop shadow. This attribute is forwarded to the flood-color attribute of the internal feFlood element.

props.name: flood-opacity
props.desc: The opacity of the drop shadow. This attribute is forwarded to the flood-opacity attribute of the internal feFlood element.
